rules_text: When this creature enters or dies, it deals 1 damage to each player. Create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]In Alacsis' bloodrings, everyone's scrap or a scrapper. Usually both.[/i]
